description.en_US: Unleash a fury of punches within small radius in front of you.
Evade attacks and deal two piercing blows to a single target, leaving them taken back.
Unleash a furious flurry of punches at nearby enemies before hammering the ground hard with a fist.
Evade attacks and deal several piercing blows to a single target before finishing off with an uppercut.
Charge forward with a powerful punch to knock back one enemy.
Dash forward with a punch, damaging enemies along the way.
Perfect guard an attack and counter with a powerful punch.
Creates a damage-reducing frontal shield, lasting for a couple seconds and perfect guarding incoming hits.
Perfect guard an attack and counter with five tackles, swift as the wind.
Creates a damage-reducing frontal shield, perfect guarding incoming hits and countering with ranged fists.
Charge forward with an explosive uppercut that greatly knock backs one enemy.
Dash forward while unleashing a wild fury of punches, damaging and catching enemies along the way. Then finish them off with a powerful punch.
Throw 3 homing ranged punches in the forward direction.
Generate a sonic slash with an uppercut, briefly stunning enemies in the way.
Throw a flurry of ranged sonic punches in the forward direction.
Generate a trio of sonic slashes with a quick combo, stunning enemies in the way.
